title: What does the ritual of the Talisman of the Bull signify and how should it be practiced?
first_phrase: This text describes the creation of a talisman and the associated ritual. The talisman must be simple and created without a model. The ritual involves seven days of preparing with a vegetarian diet and prayer at dawn, noon, and night. The talisman must be created two hours before sunrise on the day before the full moon falling between March 21 and April 21 under the constellation Taurus, and its design corresponds to the Assyrian intelligence supreme, the bride. The final 200 tokens provide details on the talisman's design and its character, Eerz, the Chaldean demon of the ritual.
